profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

profile:
Insta-Insulation has been satisfying customers since 1991, delivering superior Insulation Removal Services, expert Spray Foam installations and  installing Attic Insulation to new and existing homes in The Golden Horsehoe,and South Western Ontario.

As the official insulation contractor for Mike Holmes of Holmes Inspection, Love It or List It, Bryan Baeumler from Disaster DIY, Leave It To Bryan, and House of Bryan, Insta-Insulation is renowned for their commitment to service and care. We will work with you to ensure you receive the best and most complete insulation system to fit your needs. 


Servicing all sectors and focusing on all residential,Insta-Insulation is your fully insured, one-stop-shop for all your insulation needs.  

Ideal for any renovation or new builds, we provide spray foam and blown insulation, insulation removal services, attic and ventilation upgrades, weatherization and air sealing, and their famous INSTA-PANELS under concrete floor insulation- great for radiant floor heat applications. 


Your home and business are your most important investments. Let Insta-Insulation help you get the most out of it. 

For all the latest product and service information, as well as tips and promotions, check them out on our web site: 

www.instainsulation.com 

or : 

Facebook: www.facebook.com/instainsulation
Twitter: www.twitter.com/instainsulation
YouTube: www.youtube.com/instainsulation2009

Get pre-qualified for our payment programs by visiting us on online under Payment Options, deferred options and equal payments available on approved credit.

profile:
"Delivering Peace of Mind"  

WINNER of "Best Mould Remediation Company in Hamilton & surrounding areas"- Consumer's Choice Awards

Elemental Restoration offers a full line of services from DIY consultation to complete remediation and repair. We pride ourselves on customer satisfaction, we not only become the company you hired to fix the problem but an ongoing source of information in the event other problems arise.

Our goal is not only to create a safer indoor environment for our clients but also to educate them on how to prevent future problems.

By doing this we enable our clients to save money with preventative maintenance knowledge.

Elemental Restoration focuses on leading edge remediation procedures to ensure that your properties indoor environment is safe and healthy while doing this in the most cost effective way.

We provide FREE consultations and Estimates, this gives clients access to our knowledge without the costs that other companies may charge.

Our proven methods ensure that the air quality of your property is safe for you and your family.This begins with initial assessment and identification of the problem whether Mold, Asbestos or other health concern. Once this has been determined we then contain the affected area from the rest of the environment. This enables us to ensure that you and your family's health is protected during the remediation process. Following strict IICRC Guidelines we then remove all affected material treat and clean the affected areas to return your properties indoor air quality back to a safe and healthy environment for you and your family.

We Stand behind our work and ensure the issues are corrected before we leave! This means that when we have completed the work testing is performed to ensure that the remediation process has been done properly If we don't pass testing we re-clean the affected area at no addition cost! Our goal is to make your homes indoor air quality safe.

Elemental Restoration performs:
“effective removal of mold spores and mold growth from buildings, homes and commercial properties".
"asbestos testing and removal following ministry guidelines"
"indoor air quality assessment for mold, asbestos, UFFI, and other harmful particulates"
"structural drying for property damages due to water in residential, commercial and industrial buildings" 

Elemental Restoration has experienced and certified IICRC, ACM, technicians performing this work daily along with our Certified Inspectors who are ITC Certified for Thermal Camera Inspections.

Elemental Restoration operates in the Southern Ontario Region servicing all major and outlined areas such as Burlington, Brantford, Hamilton, Kitchener/Waterloo, Guelph, Mississauga, Milton, Oakville, Woodstock, Stoney Creek and also The Niagara Region.

profile: At Restoration 1 we specialize in water damage restoration services. We also offer mould remediation, fire and smoke clean up and storm response services. We take care of cleaning up any water leak with our extraction service and state of the art drying systems. We can help you to remove all the water, dry your carpets, floors, walls and furniture to restore your home or office to its original condition or even better. We perform restoration services for both residential and commercial properties. No job is too big or too small for us. Since we work with the insurance company, but not for the insurance company, our commitment is to you, the property owner and your needs. Restoration1 will take complete care of you and guide you through the entire process of getting your property back to normal as quickly as possible.

profile:
Ranked Best of 2020, we are a professional mold / asbestos / viral / lead inspection, disinfection and removal company active within Southern Ontario. 

We are the only company to offer inspectors who are certified both as mold inspectors as well as certified home inspectors, (CaNACHI). With this level of knowledge we can provide you will insights others can't. 

We offer three (3) hour turnaround times during regular business hours for inspections...with this level of customer service it's easy to see why we are the best at what we do.  

 

And we pay special attention to the challenges you face when you are concerned about your families health.
 
Maintaining a healthy indoor environment can easily be done with help from our trained and experienced professionals. The air you and your family breathe may be contaminated with black mold spores and other contaminants and dangerous particles. The only way you will know for sure is to have the air in your home inspected. We will be able to provide you with the solutions you need to insure you are breathing fresh and healthy air. When you work with us, you work with specialists who are seasoned, knowledgeable, and who regularly keep up with learning about the latest trends being made in the industry.
  
Our reconstruction teams are licensed City of Toronto contractors and we are also approved by the Province of Ontario’s GreenON Funding, something you will not find any other mold removal company has.

Our professional approach includes the following:
 
-Showing up promptly for your appointment, and prepared with the materials and the latest moisture detection and thermography tools we need.
-Respect for your home and personal belongings
-A thorough examination of your potential contamination issue
-Effective solutions based on the particular problem found in your home
-Professionals ready to address all of your questions and concerns
-Use of high-quality testing equipment and gear for accurate results
-Timely service that doesn’t keep you waiting
 
Take the next step and give us a call today. We thank you for your interest in our services, and we look forward to hearing from you soon and helping to improve the air that you breathe each and every single day!

profile:
Our Certified Type 3 workers and supervisors have over 40 years of experience conducting testing, asbestos and mold remediation surveys, providing asbestos management plans, and providing designated substance surveys. There’s more to asbestos and designated substances than just the abatement. We meet all Ontario Regulation 278/05 which regulates asbestos and mold services.
